hero.text:
We think and design unique experiences
for tomorrow's innovative digital enterprise services.

dynamicText.github: Take a look at our work.

aboutBlock.title: Close to customers across
aboutBlock.desc: Founded in 1993, Lunatech is a software development consultancy. Lunatech employs around 100 people and operates from its headquarters in Rotterdam as well as offices in Paris.

about.title: Custom software systems for over
about.text: Lunatech provides innovative solutions for the creation and/or modernisation of your digital enterprise services through the following services.

firstBlock.title: Close to customers across
firstBlock.desc: Founded in 1993, Lunatech is a software development consultancy. Lunatech employs around 100 people and operates from its headquarters in Rotterdam as well as offices in Paris.

secondBlock.title: Customised products to meet your
secondBlock.desc:
Lunatech specialises in the design, development, deployment and ongoing operation of customised software solutions to complex challenges.

Each application is meticulously designed to meet the specific requirements of our customers.

visions.1: Our work is characterised by a deep commitment to quality, underpinned by a methodical approach to software development.
visions.2: At the heart of Lunatech's ethos is a penchant for simplicity and pragmatism.
visions.3: This conviction is rooted in the notion that truly effective software is both intuitive and robust, devoid of superfluous complexities.
visions.4: Such an approach not only serves to bolster the software's reliability, but also enhances its adaptability and maintainability.

expertise.title: Custom software systems for over
expertise.text: Lunatech provides innovative solutions for the creation and/or modernisation of your digital enterprise services through the following services.

strategicExpertise.title: Strategic Expertise
strategicExpertise.text: We help companies develop IT strategies that support their business goals.

softwareDefinedVehicle.title: Software Defined Vehicle
softwareDefinedVehicle.text: We help companies create smart, connected mobility solutions.

softwareProjectDelivery.title: Software Project Delivery
softwareProjectDelivery.text: We develop custom software to meet your specific needs.

systemIntegration.title: System Integration
systemIntegration.text: We integrate existing systems and third-party applications into your digital ecosystem.

legacyModernisation.title: Legacy Modernisation
legacyModernisation.text: We modernise legacy systems to make them more secure, agile and efficient.

expertisesPage.title: Meet your needs with our
expertisesPage.text: We provide a wide range of expertises to help you meet your needs. We are experts in the following areas:

firstBlock.title: can help you with the following

technoPlanning.title: Technology planning
technoPlanning.text: Developing long-term IT strategies and roadmaps that support business goals.

riskManagement.title: Risk management
riskManagement.text: Identifying and mitigating IT-related risks, such as security threats and data breaches

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: Keeping abreast of emerging technologies and assessing their potential impact on the organization.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.text: Ensuring data is handled securely, compliantly, and used strategically.

changeManagement.title: Change Management
changeManagement.text: Implementing IT changes smoothly to minimize disruption.

digitalTransformation.title: Digital Transformation
digitalTransformation.text: Leading efforts to transform traditional processes with digital technologies.

secondBlock.title: can help you with the following
secondBlock.text: Lunatech provides innovative solutions for the creation and/or modernisation of your digital business services through the following services.

technologies.title: Our
technologies.carouselText: With 30 years' experience in IT consulting, we offer a range of technologies to meet your immediate needs and support your future growth.

automotive.title: Automotive
automotive.text: We help companies create smart, connected mobility solutions.

entertainment.title: Entertainment
entertainment.text: Developing interactive platforms to offer immersive entertainment experiences.

finance.title: Financial
finance.text: We help companies create smart, connected mobility solutions.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.text: Creating digital data management and analysis products for the insurance industry.

scala.title: Scala
scala.text: Scala’s blend of functional and object-oriented programming makes it ideal for developing complex, high-performance applications. Lunatech’s expertise in Scala ensures that we can deliver software solutions that are both powerful and maintainable, supporting your long-term business objectives.

java.title: Java
java.text: Java is a foundational language for enterprise-level software development. At Lunatech, we use Java to build robust, scalable, and secure applications that can be deployed across various platforms. Our deep expertise in Java allows us to deliver solutions that meet your business’s most demanding requirements.

kotlin.title: Kotlin
kotlin.text: Kotlin is a modern programming language that offers enhanced productivity, safety, and interoperability with Java. We use Kotlin to develop backend services, and full-stack solutions, providing you with modern, efficient, and high-quality software.

aws.title: AWS
aws.text: AWS is a comprehensive and widely adopted cloud platform that offers over 200 fully-featured services from data centers globally. We use AWS to build scalable, secure, and resilient applications that can handle your business's most demanding workloads. Our expertise ensures that your cloud infrastructure is optimized for performance, cost-efficiency, and security.

googlecloud.title: Google Cloud
googlecloud.text: Google Cloud provides powerful tools for data analytics, machine learning, and application deployment. Lunatech leverages these capabilities to create high-performance solutions that enable data-driven decision-making and foster innovation within your organization. Our deep knowledge of Google Cloud services ensures seamless integration with your existing infrastructure and operations.

azure.title: Azure
azure.text: As a leading cloud platform, Azure offers a broad range of services to support application development, data storage, and AI-driven insights. Our proficiency in Azure allows us to deliver tailored cloud solutions that enhance productivity, drive digital transformation, and scale with your business. We ensure that your applications are efficiently deployed and managed in the Azure environment, providing a robust foundation for your digital initiatives.

openshift.title: Openshift
openshift.text: Red Hat OpenShift is a powerful container orchestration platform based on Kubernetes, enabling the development, deployment, and management of containerized applications. At Lunatech, we use OpenShift to help businesses streamline their development processes, improve application portability, and achieve greater agility in their IT operations. Our expertise ensures that your containerized applications are scalable, secure, and easy to manage.

integration.title: Integration
integration.text: We help you to integrate your applications and data, whether they are on-premise or in the cloud, using the best open source technologies.

contact.subtitle: Contact
contact.title: Let's work
contact.text: Let us help you become even greater at what you do. Send us an email so we know more.

expertiseSoftwareDefinedVehicle.title: Defined Vehicle
expertiseSoftwareDefinedVehicle.text: A Software Defined Vehicle is any vehicle that manages its operations, adds functionality and enables new features primarily or entirely through software. Software Defined Vehicles are the next evolution of the automotive industry. Lunatech has been involved with Software Defined Vehicle since 2016 while the term did not exist yet. Lunatech, together with large automobile manufacturers has been involved in processing car data at a large scale and providing services for those vehicles. Lunatech specialises in cloud middleware and processing data for software-defined vehicles.

expertiseSoftwareProjectDelivery.title: Project Delivery
expertiseSoftwareProjectDelivery.text: Lunatech specializes in custom software development, offering tailored solutions to meet the specific needs of businesses and individuals. Their services encompass requirement analysis, design, development, testing, UX design, integration, deployment, training, maintenance, scalability, security, and managing cost and time considerations. This approach allows for addressing unique challenges and opportunities, ensuring that the software is efficient, secure and scalable while requiring careful planning and skilled teams for successful implementation.

expertiseSystemIntegration.title: System
expertiseSystemIntegration.text: Lunatech excels in system integration, enhancing organizational IT by connecting disparate systems to improve efficiency and technology utilization. Utilizing Web APIs, middleware, and cloud solutions, they focus on security, compliance, and integrating legacy and new technologies. This approach makes IT environments more sustainable, agile, and cost-effective, driving better decision-making and customer experiences.

expertiseLegacyModernisation.title: Legacy
expertiseLegacyModernisation.text: Lunatech's Legacy Transformation Service modernizes outdated technology systems to align with current business needs and technology standards. This comprehensive service includes assessment and reverse engineering, business alignment, technology stack upgrade, data migration, system integration, UI modernization, testing, security enhancements, training and change management. Aimed at improving efficiency, compatibility and security. Lunatech adopts a phased or incremental approach to minimize disruption, ensuring a smooth transition to modern, agile systems that support organizational objectives effectively. Additionally, Lunatech ensures knowledge transfer and training for clients' teams, enabling them to manage the modernized application independently. This comprehensive approach helps businesses maximize their software investments without the need for costly redevelopment over multiple years.
